products.title: Occa Vapour
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 100mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: rigid pvc louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: rigid vertical blinds are not supplied with bottom weights or stabilising chain nor are they required.
